name: TryAngle: Post Jam Release
description:
Try it, you'll love it! It's a fast paced,  super addictive speed runner.

TryAngle must make it to the end of the strip as quickly as possible. While collecting as many coins as you can. You must also dodge the speed bumps, as these will slow your progress. Along the strip are speed ups. They will help you get the highest speeds. 

Now with post jam upgrades!

Explanation Screen: 

Smoother controls

Multiple Levels 

Alert System for upcoming objects.

Moving Objects that Interact with other Objects.

Dynamic Camera that responds to input.

Yellow Targets turn to Blue Targets after collision with Blue Arrows

Challenge yourself.  Challenge a friend. Who can collect the most coins? Who can get the best time? Who can get the highest speed? 

Made for the Wowie Game Jam, hosted by Jonas Tyroller. "Everything must Interact with Everything"

Thanks for all of the feedback and support! This game finished 15th in the Wowie Game Jam!
